typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		{Certifying_Body } as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Certification_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Certification_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertificationType
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@ValidDateAndCertificationID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidCertificationType@ValidCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndCertificationID split(not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Next_Audit_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Next_Audit_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_End_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_End_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedCertificationDandDate@(ValidDateAndCertificationID, InvalidDateOrCertificationID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_Id = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Derived_Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDateAndCertificationID
InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@InvalidDateOrCertificationID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Certificatiation Date / Certification End Date/ Next Audit Date / Certification ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidCertificationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalCertificationType lookup(Certification_Type_Code == Relation_Certification_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
RelationalCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalCertificationType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Relation_Certification_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidCertificationType@(ValidCertificationType, InvalidCertificationType)
IsValidCertificationType@InvalidCertificationType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Certification Type Code")) ~> InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage
InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidCertificationType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body = {Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Incident_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Incident_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncidentType
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidIncidentType@ValidIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Incident_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Incident_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Incident_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@(ValidDateAndIncidentID, InvalidDateOrIncidentID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@InvalidDateOrIncidentID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Incident Date / Incident ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidIncidentType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalIncidentType lookup(Incident_Type_Code == Relation_Incident_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
RelationalIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Relation_Incident_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidIncidentType@(ValidIncidentType, InvalidIncidentType)
IsValidIncidentType@InvalidIncidentType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Incident Type Code")) ~> InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage
InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidIncidentType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedGetParentUID
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedGetParentUID filter(UID==Parent_UID || isNull(Parent_UID)) ~> FilterGetParent
FilterGetParent select(mapColumn(
		Lkp_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectParentUIDlookup
DerivedNonNullParentUID, SelectParentUIDlookup lookup(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID == Lkp_UID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupParentUID
LookupParentUID derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Lkp_UID),toString('Question Parent relationship error'),toString(null()))) ~> ComputeValidationField
ComputeValidationField select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectSourceColumns derive(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID = coalesce(Parent_UID, UID)) ~> DerivedNonNullParentUID
SelectColumns sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@ValidDateAndTransactionID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTransactionID split(not(isNull(Derived_Transaction_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Transaction_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Transaction_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@(ValidDateAndTransactionID, InvalidDateOrTransactionID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Transaction_Date = toDate(Transaction_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Transaction_Id = toInteger(Transaction_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndTransactionID
InvalidDateOrTransactionIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTransactionID
ValidatedTransactionIDandDate@InvalidDateOrTransactionID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Transaction Date / Transaction ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrTransactionIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrTransactionID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Transaction_Date as string,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as string,
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Transaction_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalRiskOpportunityType
ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@ValidDateAndRiskOppID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidRiskOppType@ValidRiskOppType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Risk_Opp_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Lodged)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Lodged)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Date_Closed)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Closed)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@(ValidDateAndRiskOppID, InvalidDateOrRiskOppID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Lodged = toDate(Date_Lodged,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID
ValidatedRiskOppIDandDate@InvalidDateOrRiskOppID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Lodged Date / Closed Date / Risk Opp ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrRiskOppIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIRiskOppID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidRiskOppType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalRiskOppType lookup(Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code == Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalRiskOppType
RelationalRiskOpportunityType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalRiskOppType
LookupRelationalRiskOppType split(not(isNull(Relation_Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidRiskOppType@(ValidRiskOppType, InvalidRiskOppType)
IsValidRiskOppType@InvalidRiskOppType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Risk Type Code")) ~> InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage
InvalidRiskOppTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidRiskOppType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string,
		Quarterly_Incidents as string,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_COA_%'

FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MYO_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

  FROM staging.Forecast_Asset_reference

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],

	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FX_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],

	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],

	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],

	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE

WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],

	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],

FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'
